CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 5, 1945, pg. 5 reads: "Children's Get-Together - Mrs. Ruth Mitchell of Burrows Street feted her niece, Melba Lee Mitchell, on the latter's sixth birthday last week. The honoree is the daughter of T/5 Robert L. Mitchell, who is somewhere in Germany, and Mrs. Johnnie F. Mitchell.  Guests were Barbara Williams, Roxian Riles, Alfred Harris, Shirley Skelton, Clara Lee Skelton, Bobby Mitchell and Delores Martin. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Melba Lee Mitchell, celebrating her sixth birthday with guests including: Barbara Williams, Roxian Riles, Alfred Harris, Shirley Skelton, Clara Lee Skelton, Bobby Mitchell and Delores Martin, in home of Ruth Mitchell on Burrows Street
